title: Crie
body: I need help very badly because some how in game my champion won't move at all. But everything around it is perfectly fine and casting spells and buying items is normal. The major problem is it just won't move at all it all happened on March 6 and I'm very curious how is this possible? I've only play this game for 4 years and almost completing my champion collection, like a Pokemon trainer.

replies.body: It sounds like you might have a connection problem like packet loss, which is failing to transmit information between your self and the rest of the game.  You can run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to know for sure!  The results will also provide some troubleshooting steps specific to your issue.    Let me know if you have any questions!
Oh okay sure I'll try that thank you!
